author: Flo (tonebytone)
content:
Andreas, you said this is not a photography day, but may become a cooking day. LOL, have you never thought to shoot items in your kitchen? Or the food when it's plated for serving? Every day is a photography day - even when it's too nasty outside to do outside shooting.

So on days like this, how about some images of food?

Hugs,
Flo
